MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

English.Keywords: Contact Manager, Contact Management ms access, Microsoft Access,
English.Char_Desc_45: Free Contact Manager built on MS Access
English.Char_Desc_80: Simple, effective and free Contact Management database.
English.Char_Desc_250: Maintain and analyze information on your customers, suppliers and contacts using this free database created using MS Access. Write Quotes and Invoices, track business statistcs and much more.
English.Char_Desc_450: Share contact information between all DataHouse users, maintain several customer sites for one company. Changes that affect several contacts are made only once not for each person. Manage your company's various sites, maintain employee information, keep contact history, single click to e-mail using Outlook, generate professional and consistent Fax and Letters.
English.Char_Desc_2000: Share contact information between all DataHouse users, maintain several customer sites for one company. Changes that affect several contacts are made only once not for each person. Manage your company's various sites, maintain employee information, keep contact history, single click to e-mail using Outlook, generate professional and consistent Fax and Letters.
